thumb.title: soshi - hopelessness abyss
thumb.description: soshi（残夜草紙）です．ChainBeeT第7回楽曲公募採用楽曲になります．よろしくお願いいたします．Hello, this is "soshi."This song was featured in a music game called “ChainBeeT.” Please enjoy!Lyrics：soshiMusic：soshiMV：soshi～楽曲配信情報～ChainBeeT（Google Play）https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.matsu4512.chainbeet&hl=ja&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1ChainBeeT（App Store）https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/chainbeet-%E9%9F%B3%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC/id1279207701?mt=8Manufactured & Distributed by B・U・G（Billion Unreal Gigs）
